title: Amazon to ice
brief_description: Explore the wonderous waterways of South America from the infamous Tierra del Fuego to the raging rapids of the Upper Amazon; an area studded with relics from the ancient Inca past. A truly breathtaking journey includes the Moreno Glacier, the face of the Iguazu Falls and a visit to the inhabitants of the Islands in Lake Titicaca.
